Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th /Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted EB 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Southwest Highway and 79th ; WB 79th, Southwest Highway, 83rd, Lawndale and 79th: near 79th /Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th /Central Park due to street blockage near 79th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Southwest Highway and 79th including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, Southwest Highway, 83rd, Lawndale and 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
